intro: Hedyosmum nutans, commonly known as the hanging hedyosmum, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its pendulous inflorescences, which consist of small, clustered white flowers. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and often have a slightly rough texture. Hedyosmum nutans is typically found in tropical and subtropical regions, growing in shaded, moist environments.
